attributes.action: Resign immediately and call an election before Brown bleeds us dry
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Tony Blair has proved to be a total liability and is only interested in boosting his ego. He should resign immediately and call a General Election before Gordon Brown screws up the country for good. (If this doesn't happen will the last one to leave the UK turn out the lights)

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
